alert.note: Alert for St. Joseph (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 17 at 9:32PM EST until December 19 at 4:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM MONDAY TO 4 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph to 40 mph. * WHERE...In Indiana, Lagrange and Noble Counties. In Michigan, St. Joseph MI County. * WHEN...From 5 AM EST /4 AM CST/ Monday to 4 AM EST /3 AM CST/ Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel conditions will deteriorate beginning Monday morning. Strong wind gusts with falling snow will significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning, but especially the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
